pageContext.claim: “In recent weeks, an elderly homeless woman in New York City was allegedly beaten to death by a twice-deported illegal alien.  Two women in Oregon were sexually assaulted by an illegal alien previously deported 20 times.”
pageContext.analysis: The Fact Checker found no reports of an "elderly homeless woman in New York City" being beaten to death by anyone, much less an undocumented immigrant. An undocumented man who was convicted of sexual assault had previously been deported "more than 10 times" according to the Oregonian — not 20 as Trump suggests.
